mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id, o.request_id, r.store_id, s.store_name, o.status, o.approved_at FROM tbl_supply_order o JOIN tbl_supply_request r ON o.request_id = r.request_id JOIN tbl_store s ON r.store_id = s.store_id

SELECT i.material_id, m.material_name, i.quantity, m.unit FROM tbl_supply_order o JOIN tbl_supply_request r ON o.request_id = r.request_id JOIN tbl_supply_item i ON r.request_id = i.request_id JOIN tbl_material m ON i.material_id = m.material_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
